name: A Letter Arrives
description:
Dear %ENTHRALLED_NAME,

I am writing to you as I fear that some of our countrymen are acting in league with dark powers. I have always trusted and respected you, and hope I can count on you in the face of this danger.

Your friend,
%PERSON_NAME

choices.name: 'Dear Friend, Thank you for bringing me your concerns...'
choices.description: Write back to %PERSON_NAME, perhaps beginning a series of letter exchanges which you can use to gain influence over %PERSON_NAME

choices.name: Do not respond
choices.description: No response is required. Let the letter fall on deaf ears, you have more important tasks to focus on
